overview: In Aukland Harbour, New Zealand, on July 10th 1985, French navy combat frogmen placed two mines against the hull of the Greenpeace flagship Rainbow Warrior, sinking the ship and killing photographer Fernando Pereira.
tagline: On the 10th of July, 1985, the Rainbow Warrior was bombed. 1 Photographer died in the aftermath.
title: The Boat and the Bomb
